title: Bump the skiasharp group with 8 updates
body:
Bumps the skiasharp group with 8 updates: | Package | From | To | | --- | --- | --- | | [SkiaSharp](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.3` | | [SkiaSharp.Skottie](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.3` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.Forms](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.3` | | [SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.3` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.WPF](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.3` | | [SkiaSharp.Views](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.3` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.WPF](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.3` | | [SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) | `2.88.1` | `2.88.3` | Updates `SkiaSharp` from 2.88.1 to 2.88.3
Release notes

Sourced from SkiaSharp's releases.

Version 2.88.3

What's Changed

  • Add RTLD_DEEPBIND flag to dlopen mode by @​snnz in mono/SkiaSharp#2247
  • Fix the use of vcpkg by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2257
  • Use new .NET things by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2264
  • A skip is basically a read to a null buffer by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2265
  • feat: Generate for Emscripten 3.1.12 and SIMD features by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2259
  • Add build infrastructure for .NET 7 by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2255
  • Update to ubuntu-20.04 by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2256
  • Add .NET 7 Support for Blazor views by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2254
  • Intercept and capture GL for .NET by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2268
  • fix(wasm): Adjust for invalid globbing for 3.1.12 archive lookup by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2269

New Contributors

  • @​snnz made their first contribution in mono/SkiaSharp#2247

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/compare/v2.88.2...v2.88.3

Version 2.88.2

What's Changed

  • [Tizen] Change tizen graphics backend engine by @​myroot in mono/SkiaSharp#2225
  • fix: Remove unused native library block from SkiaSharp.Views.Uno.UI/WinUI by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2231
  • Convert SKRect to CGRect correctly by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2243

New Contributors

  • @​myroot made their first contribution in mono/SkiaSharp#2225

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/compare/v2.88.1...v2.88.2

Commits
  • 655cff0 fix(wasm): Adjust for invalid globbing for 3.1.12 archive lookup (#2269)
  • 5816e44 Intercept and capture GL for .NET (#2268)
  • ddfa128 Add .NET 7 Support for Blazor views (#2254)
  • cb9e814 Update to ubuntu-20.04 (#2256)
  • 20a1180 Add build infrastructure for .NET 7 (#2255)
  • 1385a7f feat: Generate for Emscripten 3.1.12 and SIMD features (#2259)
  • 3610666 A skip is basically a read to a null buffer (#2265)
  • 023ee8e Use new .NET things (#2264)
  • 9ce587d Fix the use of vcpkg (#2257)
  • 482e6ee Add RTLD_DEEPBIND flag to dlopen mode (#2247)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore major version` will close this group update PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for the specific dependency's major version (unless you unignore this specific dependency's major version or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore minor version` will close this group update PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for the specific dependency's minor version (unless you unignore this specific dependency's minor version or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore dependency` will close this group update PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for the specific dependency (unless you unignore this specific dependency or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot unignore dependency` will remove all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot unignore ` will remove the ignore condition of the specified dependency and ignore conditions
